metadata.title: CVE-2018-5750 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
The acpi_smbus_hc_add function in drivers/acpi/sbshc.c in the Linux kernelthrough 4.14.15 allows local users to obtain sensitive address informationby reading dmesg data from an SBS HC printk call.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5750` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-12-generic - 4.15.0-12.13
linux-image-4.15.0-12-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-12.13
linux-image-4.15.0-12-lowlatency - 4.15.0-12.13
linux-image-extra-4.15.0-12-generic - 4.15.0-12.13
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1006-raspi2 - 4.15.0-1006.7
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1003-aws - 4.15.0-1003.3
No subscription required

No subscription required
